title: iha para sukam
sahitya:
iha para sukhamiha aruL guhanE muruga SaNmukhanE



anupallavi



mahapatikku ponnagar aruL punyavAnE enakku nI tAnE



caraNam



kArAr pannIru kara kumArA kali tIravE aruL pArAi apAra vara krpAkarA
vIrAdhi vIra dhIra mayUrA svarNAnga sundara kavi kunjaradAsa mandArA udAravara
